item.title: rmongodb 1.8.0
item.author: selivanov.dmitriy@gmail.com (Dmitriy Selivanov)
item.description: Today I’m introducing new version of rmongodb (which I started to maintain) – v1.8.0. Install it from github: library(devtools) install_github("mongosoup/rmongodb@v1.8.0") Release version will be uploaded to CRAN shortly. This release brings a lot of improvements to rmongodb: Now rmongodb correctly handles arrays. mongo.bson.to.list() rewritten from scratch. R’s unnamed lists are treated as arrays, named lists as objects. Also it has an option – whether to try to simplify vanilla lists to arrays or not.
